original_text: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.
korean_text: 아, 슬프도다 사람은 입김이며 인생도 속임수이니 저울에 달면 그들은 입김보다 가벼우리로다

sentences.original_text: Surely men of low degree are vanity
and men of high degree are a lie
to be laid in the balance
they are altogether lighter than vanity
